pr_title: Thread Naming for easier Thread Dump analysis - CUSTCOM-145

timeline.message: Thread Naming for easier Thread Dump analysis

timeline.bodyText: The scheduler is also not used in Payara Micro so no need to create it.
timeline.author: rdebusscher

replies.bodyText: Shouldn't the log output also be affected by the guard?
replies.author: jbee

replies.bodyText: I agree with Jan here, the logger does not log "postConstruct" entry here, but on Micro lies that it is initializing the cleanup service, but it does not do that.
replies.author: dmatej

replies.bodyText: Btw on line 151 cleanupFuture variable resulting from scheduling can be removed.
replies.author: dmatej
rdebusscher

replies.bodyText: I agree, that was only first thing I noticed. Other things may have side effects, so should be postponed.
replies.author: dmatej

timeline.bodyText: I will have conflict here, but no problem...
